name: Fungicide
description:
Protect the golden mushroom from the other fungus with walls and poison.

Instructions:
Each turn, the fungus will mutate until after a certain number of turns, it will become an entirely new type of fungus with a new set of behaviours.
Take advantage of the fungus' growth behaviours and prevent them from reaching the golden mushroom.
You win if the fungus have no more space to grow, or if the fungus touch poison. 
You lose if the golden mushroom touches the other fungus, or if it touches poison.

Controls:
Left Click - Build a wall
WASD - Look around

Audio credits:
Background music: TheAsianOnes
SFX: freesound.org (1, 2)

Github Repo:
https://github.com/hpnrep6/DiscordJam-Fungi
